page.title: 09My House (1)
page.content: My house is made of bricks, sand,cement,wood,metal,glass.My house is detached.My house is a modern house.We have a big garden.We grow flowers and vegetables.We have 5 rooms downstairs.We have a kitchen,a lounge,a study,a cloakroom,and a dining room.We have got four bedrooms.I don't share my bedroom.We have 1 bathroom in our house.Mummy has a washing machine to help her wash the clothes and a tumble drier to dry our clothes,a freezer to keep our food fresh and a fridge to keep drinks fresh,a micro-wave to heat up food and a televison that makes pictures to make up stories,a stereo record player is a record player and a tape recorder a hoover cleans the carpets.Mummy uses in the kitchen:kettle that boils water and a food-mixer that mixes the food.
